publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3534 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Committee Membership—That the Parliament agrees that— Stuart McMillan be appointed to replace Dave Thompson on the Economy, Energy and Tourism Committee; Willie Coffey be appointed to replace Sandra White on the Equal Opportunities Committee; Michael Matheson be appointed to replace Alex Neil on the European and External Relations Committee; Sandra White be appointed to replace Keith Brown on the European and External Relations Committee; Stewart Maxwell be appointed to replace Stuart McMillan on the Justice Committee; Anne McLaughlin be appointed to replace Stuart McMillan on the Public Audit Committee; Anne McLaughlin be appointed to the Public Petitions Committee.
